title: Procedure most useful in replacing negative values

content.question: A student is writing a program that is intended to replace each negative value in a particular column of a spreadsheet with the value 0. Which of the following procedures is most likely to be useful in the student’s program?

choices.label: A procedure containsNegatives, which returns true if any negative values appear in the column and returns false otherwise.
A procedure countNegatives, which returns the number of negative values that appear in the column.
A procedure findNegative, which returns the row number of the first negative value that appears in the column or -1 if there are no negative values.
A procedure minimum, which returns the minimum value that appears in the column.

content.answer: A procedure findNegative, which returns the row number of the first negative value that appears in the column or -1 if there are no negative values.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
